ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Bards forgotten again....
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Interesting. I ve been hearing a lot more like this of late... Meara (my enchanter) has been a bubble from 29 for over 4 weeks now. I tried creating a new
ygData.messageBody:
>only slightly higher. At much higher levels the gap widens when we hit 53
>(lol like many of us are gonna see 53 ;) and again at 56. (Parry and
>Riposte). I personally doubt I will ever see 53 or 56... my time in EQ is
>dwindling. I dunno if I'll even reach 50 for Lyrnia (currently 45 and 2
>bubbles). And Lyrnali (my 51 bard on Test) has already been deleted in
>disgust over the whole Test fiasco.
>
>Uhh jeez where'd I go with this? LOL
>
>Lyrnia

Interesting. I've been hearing a lot more like this of late...
Meara (my enchanter) has been a bubble from 29 for over 4 weeks
now. I tried creating a new character and logging on -- i've ALWAYS
in the past had fun with a new character. But... No Go. Its just not
as fun as RL is anymore. Or maybe Everquest has lost its charm. Or.
Something.

But... I'm hearing more and more people not having fun of late.

Sarah Heacock sarah@...
Meara Daring, level 28 Enchanter, Master Jeweler, owner Meara's Boutique of
Mystiques, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faerain Wanderer, level 20 Soldier of Tunare, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faesong, level 17 HalfElf Bard of Solusek Ro, Phoenix, Solusek Ro (Qeynos) /
Jidranth, lvl 8 Iskar Warrior, Solusek Ro, Phoenix /
